channel.title: Reproducable_research on Panda Poop
channel.description: Recent content in Reproducable_research on Panda Poop

item.title: Reproducible Research
item.description: I’ve been gradually changing my workflows to be more in line with the prinicples of reproducible research. It has been life-changing – I can go back and run analyses from last year on a different computer and…it just works. It’s absolutely magical. I’m not fully reproducible yet - I shudder to think what someone would do if they came along my Projects folder at this exact moment, but I’m getting closer.
